EmailTemplate.name: RE: Introduction to MBO Partners (1378312889.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Introduction to MBO Partners (1378312889.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Nancy, So nice to meet you, I look forward to speaking with your contracts contact. Again, MBO is purely a financial services provider and Don is the professional services provider. As Don is the one providing the actual services he will sign the IC agreement with you, all we ask is that you fill out our Independent Consultant Project Set-Up Form <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8wwRKE%5FOBc4Rg%2DfpQCEChTHXxhbWceoRKLOQ12dl17an49VQsvduqvEX1W0MFcEVvfCilcasZszH0MacSBi6N3HLsEbJwpiI9kYcj5JiGTuPk1VSNoGjy4D%2D0EHRpyfWt4WW2B8xTkeUJhUwS5HwSfvjY2y3KwbF8vRYD2%2DZ130lkzMlQNPBluQSwZg6z5oLOVut3F7%2DwwrOqv64fZh892q8sdVzIKwmBXrPLSzJzo0eLkhJgNg9bDABzL80mkR63qEFiXfEnZ33pxW9lgg%2C%2C/1gwVMM7QNFhXs0g45v6WMqj%5FizvFaIvmuLNwRuX1ncI81gd3f%2D3IPVKgpfF%2DI7s8YeyOBAwUFp51%5Fy9XFPOAcJRB9OFiO1O9Uj78lJ7papkDRKRM7MBx%2Drqa%5Fm8Xp5OSllqTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5UFUy%2DR3EnIYLcqyQEJh7oK8qaff6e19mWx8nz%5FuWejIXpL0dKCw2mbJZhmrtBE7GVhu3Q%2C> so we have all the needed information to bill you. I have also included our W-9, insurance certificate, and payment information below. Best,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Don Christoferson [mailto:christod@comcast.net] Sent: Wednesday, September 04, 2013 12:22 PM To: nancy.kasen@acentia.com Cc: Sara Conde Subject: FW: Introduction to MBO Partners Hi Nancy – I just got this from Sara at MBO. Please forward to your contracts person. Thanks again. Don From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Wednesday, September 04, 2013 12:09 PM To: christod@comcast.net <mailto:christod@comcast.net> Subject: Introduction to MBO Partners Hi Don, When appropriate, please send the below email to your client contact, making sure to CC me on the email as well. This information will introduce MBO Partners, provide our payment information and other documents, and instruct them to complete the IC Project Set-Up Form so that we capture your relevant project information. Please let me know if you have any questions. If they sent you an agreement to sign please do not sign it until I can review it for you and give you some tips on best pratices. Thanks!Sara --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Dear CLIENT, Thank you for the opportunity to provide support on the upcoming/specific effort. At this point in the process, I would like to introduce you to Sara Conde, my contact at MBO Partners, Inc. MBO’s service is designed for independent consultants and small businesses that want to engage smoothly and easily with their clients. MBO takes care of my back-office administrative support, including invoicing, collecting payments, withholding taxes, insurance coverage, and much more, so that I can stay focused on providing you with the best possible service. For more information, please refer to MBO’s one-page document <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8wwRKE%5FOBc4Rg%2DfpQCEChTHXxhbWceoRKLOQ12dl17an49VQsvduqvEX1W0MFcEVvfCilcasZszH0MacSBi6N3HLsEbJwpiI9kYcj5JiGTuPk1VSNoGjy4D%2D0EHRpyfWt4WW2B8xTkeUJhUwS5HwSfvjY2y3KwbF8vRYD2%2DZ130lkzMlQNPBluQSwZg6z5oLOVut3F7%2DwwrOqv64fZh892q8sdVzIKwmBXrPLSzJzo0eLkhJgNg9bDABzL80mkR63qEFiXfEnZ33pxW9lgg%2C%2C/1gwVMM7QNFhXs0g45v6WMqj%5FizvFaIvmuLNwRuX1ncI81gd3f%2D3IPVKgpfF%2DI6Izd%5F2QBBADLLlv1B5XHvWWaIlP9LtND0ftVTDrv7XVZNAcaYFS9%5Ftr3K2D1EwTjO%2DLx2zFXGYPQnZiQDKpa6shiSv2N6gaClGq71D3AJQ6tR0vrLwI45XuLpfxqFc%2C> that explains how they work with consultants and their clients. <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8wwRKE%5FOBc4Rg%2DfpQCEChTHXxhbWceoRKLOQ12dl17an49VQsvduqvEX1W0MFcEVvfCilcasZszH0MacSBi6N3HLsEbJwpiI9kYcj5JiGTuPk1VSNoGjy4D%2D0EHRpyfWt4WW2B8xTkeUJhUwS5HwSfvjY2y3KwbF8vRYD2%2DZ130lkzMlQNPBluQSwZg6z5oLOVut3F7%2DwwrOqv64fZh892q8sdVzIKwmBXrPLSzJzo0eLkhJgNg9bDABzL80mkR63qEFiXfEnZ33pxW9lgg%2C%2C/1gwVMM7QNFhXs0g45v6WMqj%5FizvFaIvmuLNwRuX1ncI81gd3f%2D3IPVKgpfF%2DI6Izd%5F2QBBADLLlv1B5XHvWWaIlP9LtND0ftVTDrv7XVZNAcaYFS9%5Ftr3K2D1EwTjO%2DLx2zFXGYPQnZiQDKpa6shiSv2N6gaClGq71D3AJQ6tR0vrLwI45XuLpfxqFc%2C>As a function of this service, MBO Partners will be invoicing for and accepting payments on my behalf. To get everything fully initiated, please fill out and return the below form as soon as possible: - Independent Consultant Project Set-Up Form <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8wwRKE%5FOBc4Rg%2DfpQCEChTHXxhbWceoRKLOQ12dl17an49VQsvduqvEX1W0MFcEVvfCilcasZszH0MacSBi6N3HLsEbJwpiI9kYcj5JiGTuPk1VSNoGjy4D%2D0EHRpyfWt4WW2B8xTkeUJhUwS5HwSfvjY2y3KwbF8vRYD2%2DZ130lkzMlQNPBluQSwZg6z5oLOVut3F7%2DwwrOqv64fZh892q8sdVzIKwmBXrPLSzJzo0eLkhJgNg9bDABzL80mkR63qEFiXfEnZ33pxW9lgg%2C%2C/1gwVMM7QNFhXs0g45v6WMqj%5FizvFaIvmuLNwRuX1ncI81gd3f%2D3IPVKgpfF%2DI7s8YeyOBAwUFp51%5Fy9XFPOAcJRB9OFiO1O9Uj78lJ7papkDRKRM7MBx%2Drqa%5Fm8Xp5OSllqTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5UFUy%2DR3EnIYLcqyQEJh7oK8qaff6e19mWx8nz%5FuWejIXpL0dKCw2mbJZhmrtBE7GVhu3Q%2C> – Please complete, sign, and return Additionally, the following links provide important information on MBO that you will find useful: -
